theHuman:HumanRelic.NAME: Thumbs Up
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b5 #yHealthiness and #b5 #yBlock.
NL NL There are 4 levels of healthiness: Healthy ( 0 - 10 ), Very Healthy ( 11 - 18 ) and Extremely Healthy ( > 18 ).
NL NL Card Rewards have 4 choices instead of 3.

theHuman:Environmentalist.NAME: Environmentalist
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random #yJunk to your hand.

theHuman:SecretTraining.NAME: Secret Training
theHuman:SecretTraining.FLAVOR: The best way to avoid detection is to...be a ninja?
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat. NL NL Draw 3 cards and add a #yStabby #yStabby to your hand.

theHuman:EmeraldEyepiece.NAME: Emerald Eyepiece
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #yGold equal to the cost of the top card of your draw pile, multiplied by #b5.

theHuman:FireArms.NAME: Fire Arms
theHuman:FireArms.FLAVOR: A revolutionary step backward in peacemaking efforts.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yShoot a #yWeapon, also apply #b1 #yBurning to the target.
